subject: Maria Mercado Will be Terminated from Language & Culture Worldwide on July 31st, 2023
body:
We've received your request to terminate Maria Mercado on 07/31/2023. Don't worry, we won't send them any communication. 
Here's what Zenefits will take care of:
Payroll: We'll remove Maria from your payroll, and they will not be paid going forward (unless you choose to manually mark them as "active"). 
Here's what you need to take care of:
 
Final Payment: Each state has a different law regarding when a company must give terminated employees their final paychecks. Please refer to the Final Paycheck law for NJ to find out when you have cut this employee's final paycheck. We recommend that you confirm the final amount you owe Maria with your payroll provider before cutting the check. 
Termination & Severance Paperwork: If your company uses any termination forms, you'll want to get the individual to sign them and you'll want to 
add the signed documents here
 for future reference. 
If you have any questions or concerns feel free to 
contact us.
 
Thanks,
Zenefits
For more information or assistance, please visit 
help.zenefits.com
.

subject: Melissa Horne Neu Will be Terminated from Language & Culture Worldwide on July 28th, 2023
body:
We've received your request to terminate Melissa Horne Neu on 07/28/2023. Don't worry, we won't send them any communication. 
Here's what Zenefits will take care of:
Payroll: We'll mark Melissa for termination in payroll on 
07/28/2023
, and continue to pay them unless you manually remove them. Issue their last pay check by running termination payroll. 
Not sure how? 
We recommend you understand 
your state's specific final paycheck requirements 
to remain compliant with the law. 
Here's what you need to take care of:
 
Final Payment: Each state has a different law regarding when a company must give terminated employees their final paychecks. Please refer to the Final Paycheck law for SC to find out when you have cut this employee's final paycheck. We recommend that you confirm the final amount you owe Melissa with your payroll provider before cutting the check. 
Paid Time Off: South Carolina law may require you to pay employees for their unused PTO upon termination, but you should check with your lawyer or accountant. If you do owe employees for unused PTO, make sure to add $1,038.46 to their final paycheck. 
Termination & Severance Paperwork: If your company uses any termination forms, you'll want to get the individual to sign them and you'll want to 
add the signed documents here
 for future reference. 
If you have any questions or concerns feel free to 
contact us.
 
Thanks,
Zenefits
For more information or assistance, please visit 
help.zenefits.com
.

subject: Jake Pieczynski Has Been Terminated from Language & Culture Worldwide on July 14th, 2023
body:

Here's what Zenefits will take care of:
Payroll: We'll remove Jake from your payroll, and they will not be paid going forward (unless you choose to manually mark them as "active"). 
Here's what you need to take care of:

Please refer to the Final Paycheck law for IL to find out when you have cut this employee's final paycheck. We recommend that you confirm the final amount you owe Jake with your payroll provider before cutting the check. 
Termination & Severance Paperwork: If your company uses any termination forms, you'll want to get the individual to sign them and you'll want to

body:
Hey there
It looks like 
accounting@lcwmail.com
 is shared…. 
Can you see if you can share it with me? 
p.coulter@lcwmail.com
 
 
From: 
Randall Stieghorst <r.stieghorst@lcwmail.com>
Date: 
Friday, February 10, 2023 at 3:38 PM
To: 
Pamela Coulter <p.coulter@lcwmail.com>
Subject: 
RE: accounting@
It doesn’t have a password – it is shared…and can only be accessed by people who are logged into their own email account (and it is then shared with them). 
 
Tech Support should be able to guide you how to make it appear in your list of email accounts in your Outlook – that’s a bit beyond my scope, unfortunately!
Cheers,
Randy

subject: [Important] Your 2nd Quarter Payroll Tax Reconciliation is Complete
body:
Hi,
Reconciliation runs are part of a payroll provider's normal quarter's-end reconciliation process. Zenefits Payroll is running those corrections to ensure you pay the correct amount to each tax jurisdiction where you're liable for payroll taxes.
When we do reconciliations, we look for variances between what we collected in taxes from your pay runs in the quarter and what the tax agencies expect you to pay. In some cases, we'll find variances between these two amounts. Variances are normal, and can be the result of a number of things.
Here's a snapshot of where you stand, and what will happen next:
For your Full-Service jurisdictions, we will automatically create pay runs in your account and you'll see the following net amount 
credited to 
your bank account ending in ******6303 by July 11, 2023 for $0.04 for Unemployment Tax.
For additional details, please feel free to review your 
All In One report
 from your Payroll app.
Thanks, 
Zenefits 
Questions or concerns? Visit 
help.zenefits.com
. 
© Zenefits

Subject: 
Antonio Jones Accounting onboarding sessions
Good afternoon,
 
As you are all aware our new controller, Toni Jones starts this Wednesday, July 5
th
. I’ll be doing his general onboarding sessions the first day and a half but I do not have any role specific sessions scheduled after that. 
@Michelle Murcia
 or 
@Pamela Coulter
 do you have some sort of accounting manual you can share with Toni? I spoke to Randy today and he said you all have been documenting the different processes throughout these past months. Do you have time to lead a few specific accounting onboarding sessions Friday or early next week? 
 
What else besides QuickBooks, DropBox and Compass will he need to have? 
 
Kendall is leading an intro to Dropbox and intro to Compass session but it will only be general, not a deep dive into those systems. 
Below are a list of topics Randy and Jennifer had for David’s onboarding back in Nov. 
Travel Expenses
QB Accounts & Invoicing
Invoice Submission
Payables
QB & Bank Feeds
Payroll
Month End Tasks & Reporting
Month End Reporting Project 
 
Please let me know how I should schedule his onboarding plan.
 
Thanks,
